name: Harper
headline: Harper is an AI-native commercial insurance brokerage.
description: At Harper (fka Tatch) are building an infinitely scalable commercial insurance brokerage using proprietary software, AI agents, and expert human training operators. Our initial focus is surplus lines insurance.

founders.name: Tushar Nair, Founder
founders.description: CTO @ Harper (W25) prev: Goldman, Poolit. Building a new-school commercial insurance brokerage with AI.

founders.name: Dakotah Rice, Founder
founders.description: CEO @ Harper (W25) Building a new school insurance brokerage with AI. prev: Goldman, Carlyle, Coatue, Poolit. Brown '12, HBS dropout '21

generated_description:
**Company Summary: Harper**

Harper is an innovative player in the world of commercial insurance, founded in 2024 as part of Y Combinator Batch W25. Based in San Francisco, the company consists of a dynamic team of eight employees, including Group Partner Tom Blomfield.

**Mission and Vision:**
Harper's mission is to be an AI-native commercial insurance brokerage, enhancing how businesses protect themselves from risks. Initially, they are focusing on surplus lines insurance, leveraging proprietary software and AI agents to create a scalable and efficient brokerage.

**Unique Selling Proposition:**
Harper differentiates itself with a robust client-first mentality. They offer:

- **Timely Service**: Availability around the clock to assist clients, ensuring that business operations never suffer due to the unavailability of support.
  
- **Expert Team**: A team composed of top-tier risk experts hailing from notable firms like Goldman Sachs and Coinbase, dedicated to providing superior risk analysis.

- **Cutting-Edge Technology**: The engineering team has developed custom AI and machine learning tools to enhance relationships with various carriers, maximizing value for clients.

**Client Engagement:**
With over 1,000 clients and $7 million saved for them, Harper’s focus on customer relationships is paramount. They emphasize listening to clients to tailor coverage solutions that meet specific needs.

**Target Industries:**
Harper specializes in several sectors, showcasing their commitment to deep expertise:
- Artisan Contractors
- Auto Repair Shops
- Car Dealerships
- Trucking & Transportation

**Conclusion:**
Harper is setting a new standard in the commercial insurance space by blending human expertise with the power of AI, creating a 21st-century brokerage that meets the evolving needs of businesses. For those looking for modern insurance solutions, Harper stands ready to deliver with a suite of services designed to protect both business assets and peace of mind.

For more information, visit their website at [https://www.harperinsure.com/](https://www.harperinsure.com/).
